Crystal Palace have expressed an interest in Leicester City winger Demarai Gray. 
The 24-year old is out of contract in the summer and has interest from Bayer Leverkusen among others.
However, Leic… [+1011 chars]

articles.author: Phil Kirkbride
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti explains Everton's plan for 'modern midfielder' Jean-Philippe Gbamin - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Gbamin continues to train alone as he works his way back to full fitness following nearly 18 months of injury hell
articles.content:
Everton are managing Jean-Philippe Gbamin's recovery with extra care to ensure he doesn't suffer another set-back - which would be "really, really difficult" to recover from. 
Carlo Ancelotti remain… [+2012 chars]
